subsc: Adult literacy/non-formal education,Other social services,General public administration sector,General education sector
sectr: Education,Health and other social services,Public Administration, Law, and Justice
trustfund: TF030322-FRENCH CTF FOR EXPERTISE FY03 - AFGHANISTAN

abstracts.cdata!:
The project development objectives were
            to selectively support Afghanistan in its efforts to
            reconstruct and develop the education sector to: (a)
            increase access to education opportunities in the formal and
            non-formal systems for under-served groups, especially women
            and girls; (b) support the development of a policy framework
            and the reform of education management at all levels, in
            partnership with civil society, Non-Governmental
            Organizations (NGO) and the private sector; and (c)
            introduce modern information technologies for communications
            in and among the ministries, and distance learning for
            capacity building of civil servants. The key indicators were
            increases in enrollments and female staffing at all levels
            of the education sector and all other indicators were either
            satisfactory or better. The report also gives lessons
            learned and suggestions for problems.
